License and contact
*******************

The dependencies used in the project are either themselves also distributed under X license or distributed under a compatible license.

Main authors and contacts:

*KaMI* (ex Kraken Benchmark) is developed since 2020, with contributions of `Inria <https://inria.fr>`_ Paris.
